articles.description: Kahlil Dukes scored 22 points, Marvin Prochet and Matt Scott each had double-doubles and Niagara pulled away in the second half to beat Fairfield 95-83 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Niagara pulls away in second half, beats Fairfield 95-83

articles.description: O'Showen Williams scored a career-best 20 points and Ronshad Shabazz added 19 with three steals as Appalachian State pulled away in the second half for an 81-66 win over Coastal Carolina in Sun Belt Conference action on Saturday afternoon.
articles.headline: Appalachian St. closes strong, tops Coastal Carolina 81-66

articles.description: The Gators hold the Gamecocks to 20 points in the first half and outrebound USC 46-24 in the road win.
articles.headline: Florida runs past South Carolina 65-41

images.caption: The Gators hold the Gamecocks to 20 points in the first half and outrebound USC 46-24 in the road win.
images.name: Florida runs past South Carolina 65-41

articles.description: Josh Hearlihy and Morgan Means combined to score 34 points and Seattle picked up its ninth straight win over Chicago State, 91-81 in a Western Athletic Conference game Saturday afternoon.
articles.headline: Seattle hands Chicago State its 20th straight loss, 91-81

articles.description: The Tigers bounce back from a one-point loss to Texas A&M with a convincing 78-61 win over Georgia.
articles.headline: Auburn takes battle against Georgia

images.caption: The Tigers bounce back from a one-point loss to Texas A&M with a convincing 78-61 win over Georgia.
images.name: Auburn takes battle against Georgia

articles.description: Forward Kevin Puryear nails a 3-pointer with ten seconds remaining to help the Tigers win at home despite a late-game comeback by the Bulldogs.
articles.headline: Mizzou earns 89-85 OT win vs. MSU in wild finish

images.caption: Forward Kevin Puryear nails a 3-pointer with ten seconds remaining to help the Tigers win at home despite a late-game comeback by the Bulldogs.
images.name: Mizzou earns 89-85 OT win vs. MSU in wild finish
